function.name: spawn_server_create
function.description: Create a server. Provisions a new VPS. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

type.description: Server type slug. Only `small` is available in beta.

ssh_keys.description: Array of SSH key IDs (from `POST /v1/ssh-keys`) to install.

user_data.description: Cloud-init user data script to run on first boot.

function.name: spawn_server_list
function.description: List servers. Returns all servers owned by the authenticated wallet, paginated. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of servers to return. Max 100.

function.name: spawn_server_get
function.description: Get server. Returns full details for a single server. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_delete
function.description: Delete server. Destroys the server and releases its resources. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_start
function.description: Start server. Starts a stopped server. Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_stop
function.description: Stop server. Stops a running server (graceful shutdown). Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_reboot
function.description: Reboot server. Reboots a running server. Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_resize
function.description: Resize server. Changes the server type (CPU/RAM). Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

upgrade_disk.description: Whether to upgrade the disk alongside the CPU/RAM. Irreversible if true. (default: false)

function.name: spawn_server_rebuild
function.description: Rebuild server. Reinstalls the server from a fresh OS image. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

image.description: OS image slug to rebuild with.

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_create
function.description: Register SSH key. Registers a public SSH key with the provider. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_list
function.description: List SSH keys. Returns all SSH keys registered by the authenticated wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_delete
function.description: Delete SSH key. Removes an SSH key from the provider. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).
